step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fingers closed into fists and arms in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Ensure you are exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you move.
Great job! Continue to open your fingers wide and extend arms to shoulder height while exhaling and relaxing.
You're doing well maintaining the horizontal arm extension. Focus on a full exhale and complete muscle relaxation.
Excellent execution of the outward arm movement. Keep up the good work with the breathing and muscle relaxation.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to close your fingers into fists and draw arms in, inhaling and tightening.
Good transition to opening fingers and extending arms. Exhale fully and relax your muscles as you move.
Keep up the great form! Continue opening fingers wide and extending arms to shoulder height, exhaling and relaxing.
You're maintaining good control. Ensure a complete exhale and full muscle relaxation as you extend your arms.
Fantastic finish to the second rep! You've successfully completed the horizontal pumping motion with good form.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to focus on fully opening your fingers and extending your arms to shoulder height while exhaling and relaxing your muscles. Keep practicing these movements to promote lymphatic drainage.
